name: Fort Dodge Flight Support, Inc.
about: Fort Dodge Flight Support, Inc., located at the Fort Dodge Regional Airport in Iowa, is a comprehensive aviation service provider. We offer flight training programs, including Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, and Flight Instructor certifications, led by certified flight instructors. Our facility provides 24-hour fueling services with prior request, full and self-service fueling options for Phillips 100LL and JetA, maintenance, deicing, catering, and courtesy vehicles. Additionally, we offer aviation supplies, hangar rentals, and aircraft rental services. For all your aviation needs, contact us at 515-955-3434. We are dedicated to providing top-notch services to ensure a safe and successful flying experience.
